response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 to me due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for a special consideration price of $12,000. This is an exceptional deal considering its market value of $8,000 to you. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
